import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder } from '@angular/forms'; import { ActivatedRoute, Router } from '@angular/router'; import { AuthService } from './auth.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'] }) export class LoginComponent { constructor(private formBuild: FormBuilder, private authService: AuthService, private router: Router, private route: ActivatedRoute) { } onSubmit(){ } }
